desc: Intensive study of musical masterworks from ca.1890 to the present, focusing on formal and stylistic trends as well as the political, philosophical and economic contexts of Western art and popular music from French impressionism through American hip hop. Course work includes bibliographic instruction, lecture/discussion, and an analytic research paper. Offered fall semester 2016-2017 and alternate years. Prerequisites: MUSIC 241 and MUSIC 242.
name: Music of 20th/21st Cent
title: Music of the 20th and 21st Centuries
